SELECT V.*,VR.id as roomid,VR.state as roomStatu FROM whg_ven V
left JOIN whg_ven_room VR ON V.id= VR.venid left JOIN whg_ven_room_time VRT ON VR.id = VRT.roomid
WHERE V.state = 6 AND V.delstate = 0
AND VR.state = 6 AND VR.delstate = 0 AND VRT.state = 1
AND V.title like "%"#{title}"%"
AND V.etype like "%"#{etype}"%"
AND V.etag like "%"#{etag}"%"
AND V.cultid = #{cultid}
AND V.area = #{area}
GROUP BY V.id
ORDER BY V.statemdfdate DESC

SELECT vro.*, vr.title, v.address, v.phone ,vr.location FROM whg_ven_room_order vro LEFT JOIN whg_ven_room vr ON vro.roomid = vr.id INNER JOIN whg_ven v on vr.venid = v.id WHERE 1=1
AND vro.userid = #{userid}
AND (vro.timeday < #{nowday} OR vro.timeday = #{nowday} AND vro.timestart < #{nowtime} )
AND (vro.timeday > #{nowday} OR vro.timeday = #{nowday} AND vro.timestart >= #{nowtime} )
GROUP BY vro.id ORDER BY vro.crtdate DESC
